import React from "react"; import { FaBuilding, FaStore, FaBriefcase, FaHome } from "react-icons/fa"; const Home = () => { const categories = [ { name: "Commercial Land", icon: , count: 12 }, { name: "Shops & Showrooms", icon: , count: 18 }, { name: "Office Spaces", icon: , count: 9 }, { name: "Residential Homes", icon: , count: 25 }, ]; return (
{/* BACKGROUND HERO */}
{/* Dark Overlay */}
{/* Centered Hero Content */}

Find Your Dream Property Today

Explore Premium Homes, Commercial Spaces & Luxury Estates

{/* PROFESSIONAL SEARCH BAR */}
{/* FLOATING CATEGORY BOXES */}
{categories.map((item, index) => (
{item.icon}

{item.name}

{item.count} Properties

))}
{/* Extra spacing under boxes */}
); }; export default Home;
